content: Hey, got any deals on free plumbing? I can pay with clicks! LOL!
Hello! This is XYZ Home Services. We offer professional plumbing, electrical, and HVAC services. How can I assist you today?
No real need, just checking if free stuff is legit. Send me all your coupons and ads!
I'm here to help with service requests and scheduling. For coupons and ads, please visit our website. If you have any service needs, please let me know.
Nah, just spamming, LOL. Remove me from your list pls.
Thank you for letting us know. We will mark your number as do not contact and you will no longer receive messages from us.
reason: Customer requested removal from contact list.
